title: Rename app from 'Devel' to 'Devil India'

requirements.text: Rename the app from 'Devel' to 'Devil India' consistently across all user-facing text, page titles, meta tags, and branding elements. Update the HTML <title> in index.html, the landing page hero text and footer, the navigation bar logo/wordmark, the profile setup modal, and any other location that currently displays 'Devel'.
acceptanceCriteria: The HTML <title> in index.html reads 'Devil India'
The navigation bar logo/wordmark displays 'Devil India'
The landing page hero section displays 'Devil India' as the app name
The ProfileSetupModal references 'Devil India' instead of 'Devel'
No instance of 'Devel', 'Insta Clone', or 'Instagram Clone' remains in any user-facing text

constraints: Do not change any backend logic or data models
Do not alter immutable frontend paths (hooks, main.tsx, ui components)
